overview:
Edgevertise is an innovative Internet company focussed on building great â€œcontent and application deliveryâ€ products for the web and mobile.

We are based in Brisbane, Australia with an office in Lucknow, India and are currently in the process of setting up headquarters in San Francisco, CA. The core team has been working with Roop K Bhadury, founder, since December 2005; well before Edgevertise was formally incorporated in May 2008.

Edgevertise has developed an Online Advertising system that monetises website real estate by using highly interactive, layered ads called Edgelets, that significantly increase user engagement.

In an environment where online advertising has largely become an annoyance to web visitors, Edgevertise aims to hand control squarely back to them. Our ads stay out of the way and you can interact with them without having to click away!

User interaction levels on Edgevertise ads are anywhere between 4-10 times any other exisiting online advertising mechanism.

Key Benefits:

  1. for Users - Interact with rich, layered content without being whisked away to another page (Active User Engagement)

  2. for Web Publishers - Present ads that do not take users away from their website (Increased Page View duration)

  3. for Advertisers - Present multiple layers of commercial content (e-commerce as well, moving forward) to users, simulcast across the web and mobile platforms in one integrated presentation format (Integrated Advertising Content)
